verse:
तदु होवाच ब्राह्मणः ।
श्रीकृष्णो वै परमं दैवतम्।
गोविन्दान्मृत्युर्बिभेति ।
गोपीजनवल्लभज्ञानेनखिलम तज्ज्ञातं भवति ।
स्वाहेदं विश्वं संसरतीति ॥

terms.गोविन्दान्: the sustainer of the world, Govinda
terms.गोपीजनवल्लभज्ञानेन: by knowledge of the beloved of the gopis (cowherd girls)

meaning: Translation:Therefore, the learned Brahmana said, "Indeed, Lord Krishna is the supreme deity. Even death fears Govinda. By having knowledge of the beloved of the gopis, one knows everything. O be it so! This world is transmigrating."
